author: arichardson
title: Lionel Messi’s dad leaves Barcelona with no progress made over new contract — and club worry that ‘with every passing day, deal becomes more expensive’
text:
EFL messi situation Lionel Messi’s dad leaves Barcelona with no progress made over new contract — and club worry that ‘with every passing day, deal becomes more expensive’ 
Real Madrid's defeat to Valencia has re-opened La Liga title race and Nou Camp hierarchy's focus has shifted elsewhere By ANDREW RICHARDSON
